note: Modeling and simulation program for mechatronic systems and control.
Rapid prototyping tool for embedded hardware and industrial controllers.
Integrated simulation platform for the analysis of multi-domain mechatronics systems by Siemens PLM Software
DesignXplorer is able to export a computed response surface as an FMU.
SCADE Display facilitates embedded graphics, display and HMI development and certified code generation for safety-critical displays from ANSYS.
SCADE Suite is a model-based development environment with certified code generation for safety critical embedded applications from ANSYS.
ANSYS Simplorer is a multi-domain, multi-technology simulation program from ANSYS.
AUTOSAR product from Dassault Syst&egrave

AVL CRUISE™ M is a realtime, multi-disciplinary, vehicle system simulation software used in office environments for the design of powertrains and thermal management systems, in HiL environments for control function development and calibration, and in testbed environments to provide simulation models for component testing.
Vehicle system analysis tool for the optimization of fuel efficiency, emission, performance and driveability, from office to HiL to testbed.
Model.CONNECT&trade
High end multibody dynamics simulation software from MSC Software
Simulink via @Source
B&Rs Automation Studio is a software engineering platform for industrial automation targetting PLCs, industrial PCs, HMI and embedded controllers from B&R.
Simulation of exhaust aftertreatment systems from Exothermia.
BCVTB is a Software environment, based on Ptolemy II, for co-simulation of, and data exchange with, building energy and control systems.

BEAST is an advanced dynamic simulation tool for rolling bearings and other mechanical systems with contacts available through SKF Engineering Consultancy Services. BEAST analyzes what will happen under real conditions and predicts the behaviour of complex equipment that incorporates rolling bearings.
CANoe is the comprehensive software tool for development, test and analysis of entire ECU networks and individual ECUs.
Environment for Product Design and Innovation, including systems engineering tools based on Modelica, by Dassault Syst&egrave
A free standalone FMI co-simulation master implemented in Java with a JSON API. It is developed as part of the INTO-CPS project.
Interfaces and helper functions for writing FMI-compliant model/slave code in C++.
FMUs can be imported, represented, connected and co-simulated in SysML models.
CarMaker is an open test- and integration-platform for MiL, SiL and HiL.
Environment for IEC 61131-3 control applications from Dassault Systèmes
Free and open-source software for distributed co-simulation.
Co-simulation Environment from ChiasTek
Industrial product for nonlinear Model Predictive Control (NMPC) from Cybernetica.
Software for model verification, state and parameter estimation, using logged process data. By Cybernetica.
Master Algorithm generator & deployer from RISEGrid for a multi-OS, multi-threaded and distributed cosimulation implementing all the FMI 2.0 features.
Intergrated structure and motion analysis software from VirtualMotion.
Fluid power simulation software from FLUIDON
FMI Kit for Simulink provided by Dassault Systè
FMI Kit for Simulink provided by Dassault Systè
Open and flexible simulation framework by TESIS DYNAware.
Modelica environment from Dassault Syst&egrave
Creation and export of statistical (meta) models using Design of Experiments (DoE) from ETAS.

displayName: ETAS - FMI-based Integration and Simulation Platform
note: Integration and simulation platform based on FMI 1.0 from ETAS.
FMU Generator for ASCET from ETAS.
FMU Generator for Simulink<sup>&reg
Guided and automated calibration of FMUs with connection to ETAS INCA.
PC based platform from ETAS for ECU software validation at the component, sub-system or system level
Frontend for ETAS HiL systems LABCAR, operating on the creation of experiments and their subsequent execution.
High performance simulation environment for multi-domain system dynamics from MSC Software.
EcosimPro, System Modelling and Simulation Software
Whole building energy simulation program
Workbench for inspection, customization and pre-integration of FMUs including parallelization and stand-alone simulation generation from PMSF.
Open source (BSD) C library for integration of FMI technology in custom applications by Modelon.
Export of stand-alone FMUs for Co-Simulation from Simulink using Simulink Coder - provided by ITI
The FMI Toolbox for MATLAB/Simulink from Modelon enables FMU import and export for MATLAB/Simulink for both model exchange and co-simulation.
FMI Add-in for Microsoft Excel by ​Modelon. Offers support for batch simulation of FMUs.
The FMI Blockset for Simulink enables the import of FMU's for use in Simulink - developed by Claytex.
NI VeriStand supports FMI through the use of the FMI add-on for NI VeriStand from Dofware
A Python library to simulate FMUs
FMU Software Development Kit from QTronic.
High capability 1D CFD tool for thermo-fluid simulation from Mentor Graphics.
GES is an object oriented simulation tool, for dynamic and static (algebraic) systems, Based on a hybrid bondgraph model. The tool is mainly used for ship power designs. Provided by TNO.
Multi-Physics Simulation Platform for Powertrain and Vehicle Systems
Hopsan is a free simulation tool developed at Linköping University. It is using distributed solver techniques with good support for parallelism using multi-core processors.

ICOS is a co-simulation tool developed by Virtual Vehicle
Physics-based system simulation software for complete vehicle system modeling and simulation from Ricardo Software.
A Java Wrapper for the Functional Mock-up Interface, based on FMU SDK
Open source Modelica environment from Modelon
JavaFMI is a Java wrapper for the Functional Mock-up Interface (1.0 or 2.0) both for Windows/Linux 32 or 64 bit OS.
Virtual.Lab Motion is a high end multi body software from LMS International
MESSINA is a test platform for model-based ECU function development.
Modelica environment from Suzhou Tongyuan
Modelica-based modeling and simulation tool from Maplesoft
CarSim, TruckSim, and BikeSim are vehicle dynamics software solutions from Mechanical Simulation that support XiL development workflows and power real-time driving simulators around the globe.

MoBA Lab gives the user a wide-ranging portfolio of different tools for the model-based development process of thermal and other types of systems. The MoBA Simulator is available for Excel, Python, C++, and various other environments.
MORPHEE is a system for automation, simulation and calibration from FEV.
Graphical programming environment for measurement, test, and control systems from National Instruments
Discontinued
Open source Modelica environment from OSMC
Modelling tool for the Vienna Development Method with supports for export of tool wrapper and source code FMU's.
PROOSIS, Propulsion Object-Oriented Simulation Software
Software environment for design and analysis of heterogeneous systems.
For Python via the open source package PyFMI from Modelon. Also available as part of the JModelica.org platform.
High End Multi Flexible Body Dynamcis Software from FunctionBay
High end multi-body simulation software from SIMPACK AG
FMI support for Scilab / Xcos a free and open source software for numerical computation.
Generation of virtual ECUs and virtual integration platform for Software in the Loop from QTronic.
SimWB is an open, powerful framework to run SIL, HIL, and MIL simulations under Concurrent's hard real-time RedHawk OS that runs on COTS hardware.
Multi-domain simulation tool for design, analysis and virtual prototyping of complex systems developed by ESI ITI GmbH.
Squish is a GUI Test Automation Tool. As an FMU importer, Squish test scripts can access all variables exposed by a FMU and is responsible for driving the simulation process.
Modelica environment from Wolfram Research.
TLK FMI Suite provides LabVIEW and Simulink blocks for FMU simulation
Co-simulation environment from TLK-Thermo
Communication layer tool to flexibly plug together models for performing a co-simulation
Cryptographic protection and signature of models including their safe PLM storage
Multi-body dynamic and kinematic simulation for valvetrain, powertrain and transmission systems from Ricardo Software.
Multibody dynamics simulation software for internal combustion engines, transmissions and their components from FEV.
Real-time, crank-angle resolved engine simulation tool for testing new engine management systems in SiL, HiL, and rapid-prototyping from Ricardo Software.

Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) code which uses a particle-based kinetic solver based on the Lattice-Boltzmann Method, thus avoids the meshing process and allows complex fluid-structure interaction including through FMI standard co-simulation.
AGX Dynamics is a professional multi-purpose physics engine for simulators, engineering, large scale granular simulators and more.
dSPACE SCALEXIO is a Hardware-in-the-Loop (HIL) integration and simulation platform from dSPACE. Please also refer to the dSPACE FMI sites for more information about the FMI 1.0 and FMI 2.0 support.

dSPACE SYNECT is a data management tool from dSPACE that enables you to manage FMUs and Simulink models as well as their dependencies, versions and variants throughout the entire software development process. Please also refer to the dSPACE FMI sites for more information about the FMI support.

TargetLink is a production code generator from dSPACE that generates highly efficient C-code directly from Simulink/Stateflow models. Please also refer to the dSPACE FMI sites for more information about the FMI support.
dSPACE VEOS is a PC-based virtual integration and simulation platform from dSPACE. Please also refer to the dSPACE FMI sites for more information about the FMI 1.0 and FMI 2.0 support.
EMTP-RV is a power system simulation tool. Version 3.4 or higher is required to use the FMI capabilities.
The MpCCI CouplingEnvironment from Fraunhofer SCAI is a vendor neutral interface for cosimulation in the 3D area
optiSLang supports the export of Metamodels of optimal Prognosis (MOP) as FMU.
Software environment for modeling, simulation and analysis of multi-disciplinary systems from Altair.
Heterogeneous model integration environment & virtual instrumentation and experimentation laboratory from IFPEN distributed by D2T.
